channel.title: My lunar altar isnt working?
channel.description: when i click on my lunar altar it says this: exception in "thread 5" java.lang.nullpointerexception at client.draw interface and some other stuff when i re-open my client and then i click on my spellbook it disconects me again and says the same thing as above?
